page.title: 02HOME LIFE IN BERGHOLT
page.content: ON A SATURDAY I GET UP AT 7.30am. I GET WASHED & DRESSED & HAVE MY BREAKFAST.I COLLECT MY MUSIC TOGETHER FOR MY PIANO LESSON WITH MY TEACHER MRS CAMPLING WHO LIVES ON THE EDGE OF COLCHESTER.DAD TAKES ME TO HER HOUSE AT 8.45am.I PLAY MY MUSIC TO HER & SHE WILL CORRECT ME IF I GO WRONG.AT 9.30am DAD TAKES ME TO THE TECHNICAL COLLEGE & I MAKE MY WAY TO THE MUSIC DEPARTMENT.I HAVE A PRACTICAL LESSON ON MY CLARINET FOR 15 MINUTES,THEN I GO TO ANOTHER ROOM & HAVE MY ORAL & THEORY LESSONS.I FIND THIS TAKES ME UNTIL NEARLY 12.00 NOON.DAD TAKES ME HOME & MY FAMILY & I HAVE OUR LUNCH. AFTER THAT I WEED MY GARDEN,OR TAKE MY JACK_RUSSEL DOG FOR A WALK.AT 5.30pm I PUT THE TELEVISION ON & WATCH IT.
